metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19045 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: keepalived 2.0.8 used mode 0666 when creating new temporary files upon a call to PrintData or PrintStats, potentially leaking sensitive information.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xenial and earlier don't have dbus support

criterions.comment: keepalived package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.10-1').
